tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE attractions (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  attraction_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  location TEXT NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE attractions (
    attraction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    attraction_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE tours (
    tour_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    attraction_id UUID REFERENCES attractions(attraction_id),
    tour_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    tour_description TEXT,
    duration_hours INT
);

CREATE TABLE activities (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    duration INT,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE tours (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    duration INT,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE recommendations (
   recommendation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   attraction_id UUID,
   activity_id UUID,
   tour_id UUID,
   comments TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE attractions (
  attraction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  attraction_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  admission_fee DECIMAL(10, 2),
  opening_hours VARCHAR(100),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE activities (
  activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  activity_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  duration_minutes INT,
  activity_type VARCHAR(50),
  price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE tours (
  tour_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  tour_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  locations TEXT,
  duration_hours INT,
  tour_guide VARCHAR(100),
  price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE concierge_services (
  concierge_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  concierge_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  contact_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(255),
  work_schedule VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE guest_recommendations (
  recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  guest_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  recommendation TEXT,
  rating INT,
  recommendation_date DATE
)
